dmca.title: NetEnforcers complains of  images in Froogle
dmca.body:
Tue, 17 Oct 2006 09:54:24 -0400

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [ Sony Mobile ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Sony Mobile ] / :
 

Rite Buys                      CDX-454RF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://deal.ritebuys.com/prodImgs/290x260/0b80b768ab3e8ca49a707c7387cc2355.jpg&size=2&dhm=b5372532&hl=en
 

Shop                            CDX-454RF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://shop.com.edgesuite.net/ccimg.shop.com/210000/210900/210963/Products/17124074.jpg&size=2&dhm=b4e2db86&hl=en
 

JC Whitney                  CDX-454RF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.jcwhitney.com/wcsstore/jcwhitney/images/imagecache/G_11572G_TH_1.gif&size=2&dhm=7e5cb9fd&hl=en
 
Zalmar                          CDX-565MXRF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://zalmar.com/images/CDX-565MXRF.jpg&size=2&dhm=b0cf81c6&hl=en
 

Bargain Collections       XM-2100GTX
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://bargaincollection.com/shop/images/mg/XM2100GTX.jpg&size=2&dhm=49360607&hl=en
 
AADeals                      CDX-565MXRF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.aadeals.com/product/cdx565mxrf.jpg&size=2&dhm=42e3220d&hl=en
 

CompuVest                  CDX-565MXRF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.compuvest.us/xml/images/406000102-00.jpg&size=2&dhm=9b4df8a0&hl=en
 

Brandnamez                 CDX-565MXRF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://brandnamez.com/prodimg/SONY-CDX565MXRF.jpg&size=2&dhm=96ceb0bb&hl=en
 

Brand Toyz                  CDX-565MXRF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.brandtoyz.com/images/Product/medium/8436.jpg&size=2&dhm=78e7b843&hl=en
 

Audio Video Sale         CDX-565MXRF
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://audiovideosale.net/images/SONY-CDX565MXRF.jpg&size=2&dhm=26c87214&hl=en
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [Phillip Williamson]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 2132]
City and State: [Gainesville, FL]
Zip: [32601]
Email (ended auction inquiries)*: [Ebay.Violations@NetEnforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]

Truthfully,
/S/:  Phillip Williamson
